description:
Desperate to escape the summer heat, Keroro and the rest shrink themselves down to tiny size in order to enjoy a child`s wading pool as a fantastically huge place to swim.  But it goes terribly wrong when full-sized Natsumi decides to go into the pool, too.  Soon after that, Natsumi and Fuyuki decide to find out where the frogs have been sneaking off to every morning...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Dive! Vinyl Swimming Pool / Fuyuki & Natsumi, A New Morning Has Come
ケロロ 飛び込め! ビニールプール / 冬樹 & 夏美 新しい朝がきた
